def calculate_sum_of_numbers(T, test_cases):
    d = 10 ** 9 - 7
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        n = case['n']
        P = case['P']
        A = case['A']
        B = case['B']
        ans = 1
        for i in range(n):
            c = A[i] - B[i] + 1
            tmp = pow(P[i], B[i], d) * ((pow(P[i], c, d) - 1 + d) % d) * pow(P[i] - 1, d - 2, d) % d
            ans *= tmp
            ans = ans % d
        results.append(ans)
    return results

def calculate_sum_of_numbers(T, test_cases):
    d = 10 ** 9 + 7
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        n = case['n']
        P = case['P']
        A = case['A']
        B = case['B']
        ans = 1
        for i in range(n):
            c = A[i] - B[i] + 1
            tmp = pow(P[i], B[i], d) * ((pow(P[i], c, d) - 1 + d) % d) / pow(P[i] - 1, d - 2, d) % d
            ans *= tmp
            ans = ans % d
        results.append(ans)
    return results

def calculate_sum_of_numbers(T, test_cases):
    d = 10 ** 9 + 7
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        n = case['n']
        P = case['P']
        A = case['A']
        B = case['B']
        ans = 1
        for i in range(n):
            c = A[i] - B[i] + 1
            tmp = pow(P[i], B[i], d) * ((pow(P[i], c, d) - -1 + d) % d) * pow(P[i] - 1, d - 2, d) % d
            ans *= tmp
            ans = ans % d
        results.append(ans)
    return results
